name: Stertjes
testimony: The idealist in me was looking for a way to combine my love for design with my passion for helping people. Volunteering for the Flüüfff website turned out to be the perfect match. Designing this page? Let’s just say it was both a labour of love and a subtle way to sneak in this testimonial. I got to know some amazing folks behind the scenes and I’m honestly so grateful for the experience. 10/10 would volunteer again.
